Name: Zenith: The Last City
About the game: Parry the cold steel of your enemy's blades, time your blows for ultimate efficiency, stagger your enemy, and execute devastating combos. Zenith was built to be an infinite universe with countless players. Join parties and guilds as you fight epic world bosses, plunder the depths of exciting dungeons, and build a new life in the most fully realized online VR world ever constructed. From relaxing ocean side towns to massive white cap mountain tops, every corner of Zenith has been built for immersion.
